taxon.author: (G. W. Peckham & E. G. Peckham, 1909)

referenceObject.reference: Peckham, G. W. & Peckham, E. G. (1909). Revision of the Attidae of North America. Transactions of the Wisconsin Academy of Sciences, Arts and Letters 16(1, 5): 355-646, pl. 29-51.
